I. Exploratory Data Analysis

load and view train_tag.csv dataset provided by a Chinese bank in a modelling competition.

```{r}
tag <- read.csv("train_tag.csv")
dim(tag)[1]
colnames(tag)
rdm.index <- sample(dim(tag)[1], size=6)
tag[rdm.index,]
```
